title: Cuttlefish in a mint dressing with grilled watermelon, spiced almonds and radish salad
description: This light, summery dish would make a real showstopper starter or light lunch. If you can’t get hold of cuttlefish, you can use squid or octopus instead.
ingredients: ¼ watermelon, peeled, seeds removed and flesh cut into 2.5cm/1in cubes
1 unwaxed lemon, zest only, plus 1 tsp lemon juice
1 cuttlefish, cleaned and prepared (ask your fishmonger to do this for you), cut into 3mm/⅛in thick strips
